005b44a5-0da9-4cf4-80e4-b4ebc9a781e6:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"005b44a5-0da9-4cf4-80e4-b4ebc9a781e6","title":{"en":"A Martial Master Wakes Up as a Concubine"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Gosu, Wakes Up as a Concubine"},{"ko":"고수, 후궁으로 깨어나다"},{"ja":"武林高手转生后宫小主"},{"pt-br":"Uma Mestre Que Acordou Como Uma Concubina"},{"en":"A Master, Who Woke up as a Concubine"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","fr"],"description":{"en":"Once a notorious master of the deviant sects, Nyeonbi Cheon pays a hefty price for her romance with a man of a virtuous sect, Won Gae of the True-spirited Sword. 008511cd-ffc3-4ec4-a559-a6baeb2325ed:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"008511cd-ffc3-4ec4-a559-a6baeb2325ed","title":{"en":"SHIRITOЯI"},"altTitles":[{"en":"SHI RI TO RI"},{"en":"SHIRITORI"}],"lastChapter":"7","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Nana has lost all the crayons to her store along with Monkichi! Each chapter title is based on the game Shiritori and the theme of the chapter is based on the title which helps Nana find her crayons and Monkichi.  \n  \nShiritori is a Japanese word-game which involves taking (tori) the syllable from the end (shiri) of a word, and thinking up a new word which starts with that syllable. One English name for this game is “word chain.” If you want to try it out, you can even play online in English at \u003chttp://shiritorigame.com/\u003e  \n  \nIn this manga, the dialogue itself doesn’t use shiritori, but the chapter titles do. So the first chapter named “store” or “mi se” in Japanese, leads into a second chapter named “laundry,” which is “se n ta ku” in Japanese."},"links":{"ap":"shiritori","kt":"31257","mal":"73939","mu":"76803"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}}]}

\n의곤은 한번도 해본 적 없는 수영을 해야한다는 압박감과 \n소박한 꿈, '여자친구 만들기'를 저지하려는 신비의 압박수비를 \n3년이나 견뎌야한다는 생각에 한숨만 나온다. \n\n'의곤'과 같이 상상고 수영부 소속 '차신우'는 천부적인 재능과 외모로 인터넷에서도 유명하다. \n어머니의 죽음과 더불어, 자신에게 관심은 없고 오직 여자와 정치뿐인 아버지를 향한 경멸이 \n신우를 삐뚤어지게 만들었고, 안 좋은 친구들과 어울렸지만, 최근 관심있는 게 생겼다. \n\n자신의 배경, 외모 때문에 득달처럼 달려드는 다른 여자와 달리, \n순수하고, 솔직하고, 귀여운 신비에게 점점 마음을 빼앗기게 된다. \n\n\"뭐야, 아무사이 아냐? 그럼 신비 내가 만나도 되는 거지?\" \n\n갑자기 가슴이 요동치는 '의곤' \n'신우'의 등장으로 신비에 대한 마음이 꿈틀대기 시작하는데...\n\n---\nOfficial Chinese: [bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc26027?from=manga_detail), [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/551405)"},"links":{"mu":"168216","raw":"https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=2707843"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

012c763d-e12c-494e-9d9d-b589df7d588c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"012c763d-e12c-494e-9d9d-b589df7d588c","title":{"en":"Grand Prix Yaro"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Grand Prix Yarou"},{"ja":"グランプリ野郎"},{"en":"Grand Prix Yarō"}],"description":{"en":"Mitsuteru Yokoyama, who finished serializing \"Tetsujin 28'' which continued for 11 and a half years with \"Shonen'', a full-fledged racer story drawn after \"Tetsujin'', took on a new challenge in a new field with ``Shonen'' in January 1968. A full-fledged racer manga that started with the first issue. Shinichi Wakabayashi, a young man whose father was a genius racer who died in an accident, joins a racing team with the aim of becoming a racer like his father. He grows into a racer who competes around the world while competing with his rivals. This is an ambitious work that aims to create original entertainment while incorporating realistic expressions influenced by the graphic novels that were popular at the time. It was discontinued in the March 1969 issue due to suspension of publication of the magazine. The sequel, which was published in the \"Shonen Book,'' has been made into a book, but this is the first time that the \"Shonen'' version has been included. Most of the parts are reproduced from the manuscript, including 2 pages of color pages and 18 pages of color doors. The appendix includes the middle story \"Red Zone'' published in \"Bessatsu Shonen Magazine'' in 1969.\n\n[Recommended information from the editor]\nOn 2 pages of the color doors, characters of famous graphic novelists who were serialized in \"Shonen\" at the time appear in collaboration. This is a valuable record of manga history."},"links":{"mu":"bv1y4o6"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}}]}

Lux used to be called the strongest Drag-Knight, but now he's known as the \"undefeated weakest\" Drag-Knight because he will absolutely not attack in battle. After his duel with Lisesharte, Lux ends up attending the female-only academy that trains royals to be Drag-Knights.\n___\n**Compositor:** [Watanabe Itsuki](https://mangadex.org/author/eb66b421-fb65-4aca-95d0-e6d29fc3ba78)\n**Character Designer:** [Kasuga Ayumu](https://mangadex.org/author/82c4316a-f764-4e20-a563-7e6dcfee6ac9)","vi":"Lux, một hoàng tử trước đây của một đế chế mang tên Arcadia bị lật đổ qua một cuộc nổi dậy năm năm trước đó. Lux sử dụng để được gọi là người mạnh nhất Drag-Knight, nhưng bây giờ anh được biết đến như là \"bất khả chiến bại yếu nhất\" mọi chuyện ra sao mời bạn đón xem"},"links":{"al":"85613","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074C1LXP1","ap":"saijaku-muhai-no-bahamut","bw":"series/21543/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/271617","kt":"26247","mal":"76369","mu":"113075","nu":"saijaku-muhai-no-bahamut"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"50880a9d-5440-4732-9afb-8f457127e836","name":{"en":"Mecha"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

Set in a dreamy, idealistic Edo-period Japan intended to comfort children during the U.S. occupation, the story follows a young princess in a long-sleeved kimono. The princess, Anmitsu-hime, and other characters are named after sweets and desserts.\n\nThe series was incredibly popular, running in multiple magazines until 1962. It inspired an anime series, two movies, three TV dramas, a radio drama, and a video game, as well as a manga reboot in 1986. \n\n(Source: MangaUpdates)"},"links":{"kt":"anmitsu-hime-1949","mu":"l2s4hp7"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}}]}

Mamoru Uchiyama's version of 'Ultraman', which was serialized very popularly by 'second graders' from 1971 to 1974, will be released as a full-scale book for the first time this autumn to commemorate the 45th anniversary of Tsuburaya Productions' Ultraman Series! The third installment is the popular work \"Ultraman Taro\" (1973)! Taro, transformed by ZAT member Taro Higashiko, is very active against scary monsters. This work is the first to draw \"Ultra no Kuni\" and is a monumental masterpiece that greatly fuses the TV series and the dreams of the readers of the school yearbook. It became a rare work of \"phantom\", and it was eagerly desired to be published in a cohesive form.\nDirector Shinji Higuchi is also enthusiastic! A girl at his school, Saeki Nanako, is his muse and his Venus, and he admires her from a distance. One day, he forgets his copy of The Flowers of Evil in the classroom and runs back alone to pick it up. In the classroom, he finds not only his book but Saeki's gym uniform. On a mad impulse, he steals it.  \n  \nNow everyone knows \"some pervert\" stole Saeki's uniform, and Kasuga is dying with shame and guilt. Furthermore, the weird, creepy, and friendless girl of the class, Nakamura, saw him take the uniform. Instead of revealing it was him, she recognizes his kindred deviant spirit and uses her knowledge to take control of his life. Will it be possible for Kasuga to get closer to Saeki, despite Nakamura's meddling and his dark secret? What exactly does Nakamura intend to do with him?\n\n\n---\nOfficial Release:\n- [Indonesian release](https://elexmedia.id/produk/serial/aku%20no%20hana-kembang%20jahanam) by Level Comics as **Aku no Hana: Kembang Jahanam** (2023)","es-la":"Takao Kasuga es un niño solitario que pasa sus días inmerso en libros para escapar de su frustración con la vida. Su única fuente de alegría es la hermosa Saeki, a quien admira en secreto desde lejos. Sin embargo, la obsesión de Takao va demasiado lejos un día cuando, en un momento de locura emocional, él roba la ropa de gimnasio de la niña y se la lleva a casa con él. Peor aún, su terrible obra es vista por Sawa Nakamura, una misteriosa marginada que se sienta detrás de él en clase y amenaza con revelar el secreto del niño a menos que prometa celebrar un contrato con ella. Al principio, parece que Sawa solo quiere un poco de compañía, pero pronto queda claro que este \"contrato\" implica más que simples charlas por la tarde. De hecho, Takao está a punto de descubrir cuán peligroso es su vínculo con Sawa y cómo amenaza con destrozar todo, su vida, su amor e incluso su cordura, aparte.","pt-br":"Takao Kasuga é um estudante do ensino médio insociável que adora livros; em particular, Les Fleurs du Mal, de Charles Baudelaire. Ele também tem uma queda pelo ídolo de sua classe, a doce Nanako Saeki. Em forte contraste com ela, Sawa Nakamura é uma garota insolente e desagradável que não tem nenhuma preocupação com a escola. Um dia, Takao esquece de levar seu livro para casa. Ele volta à escola para recuperá-lo, mas fica parado quando encontra as roupas de ginástica recém-usadas de Nanako caídas no chão. Um desejo estranho consome Takao e, como um pervertido perverso, ele os rouba. Aku no Hana é uma história convincente de amadurecimento, centrada nos pensamentos, sentimentos e relacionamentos de Takao, enquanto ele tenta viver uma vida normal com a culpa de seu crime que pesa sobre ele. Sawa, no entanto, que testemunhou o roubo de Takao, tem outros planos para ele ...","uk":"Такао Касуга це простий школяр, який любить читати книжки, в особливості збірку поезій Бодлера \"Квіти Зла\". Він трохи зневажає своїх однокласників за те, що вони не читають книжки, а також таємно закоханий в прекрасну і милу відмінницю Нанако Саекі. Але з ними в класі вчиться повна протилежність до неї, Сава Накамура, груба і замкнена дівчина, яка зневажає і ненавидить усіх навколо неї.  \n  \nОдного дня у житті Такао відбувається епізод, який назавжди змінює його життя. Побачивши у Такао споріднену душу, Накамура намагається розкрити справжнє єство Такао, хоче він того, чи ні."},"links":{"al":"54705","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B074CJYMRS","ap":"the-flowers-of-evil","bw":"series/4325/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/125675/","engtl":"https://comics.inkr.com/title/802-the-flowers-of-evil?utm_source=mgd","kt":"17216","mal":"24705","mu":"47462","raw":"https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/10834108156640562401"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

018c2577-f29d-42e2-9e74-979e03bd8930:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"018c2577-f29d-42e2-9e74-979e03bd8930","title":{"en":"The Villainess' Maker"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"악녀 메이커"},{"ko-ro":"Аgnyeo Maker"},{"ko-ro":"Аgnyeo meikeo"},{"en":"The Villainess and Her Creator"},{"en":"The Villainess's Maker"},{"tr":"Cani ve Onun Yaratıcısı"},{"es":"Hacedor de villanos"},{"id":"Pencipta Penjahat Wanita"},{"ru":"Злодейка и ее создатель"},{"ru":"Создатель злодейки"},{"th":"นางร้ายเมกเกอร์"},{"zh":"恶女制造者"},{"zh-hk":"惡女推手"},{"ja":"悪女メーカー"},{"pt-br":"Criador de Vilãs"}],"lastChapter":"72","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","es-la","pt-br","ru","id","fr","pl","tr"],"relatedIds":["1f86092e-81d1-4ed6-a0e9-e0e11ac0b7d8","8081ece5-62f5-4f01-a72b-4eebffd1d122"],"description":{"de":"Yoon Haneul war schon immer ein Schwächling, der anderen nie etwas abschlagen konnte. Bis sie eines Tages aufwacht und feststellen muss, dass sie zu Aila Mertensia geworden ist – der Schurkin aus einem Buch, das sie vor zehn Jahren selbst geschrieben hat. Haneul ist zufrieden damit, ein Leben als reicher Couch-Potato zu führen und einen Roman nach dem anderen zu lesen. Allerdings findet sie sich zu ihrem Leidwesen in einer Zeitschleife wieder, in der ein bestimmter Tag immer und immer wieder abläuft. Der einzige Ausweg: Sich so zu verhalten, wie die echte Aila Mertensia es würde! Nur leider hat Haneul keine Ahnung, wie man sich wie eine Schurkin verhält. Zu ihrem Glück taucht ein mysteriöser Hexenmeister namens Killian auf und bietet an, ihr dabei zu helfen, eine wahre Schurkin zu werden. Ihr bleibt nichts anderes übrig, als einen Pakt mit ihm zu schließen... aber kann Haneul diesem teuflisch gut aussehenden Mann wirklich vertrauen?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80-%EB%A9%94%EC%9D%B4%EC%BB%A4/2456), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56291021)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-villainesss-maker)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29741)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%8E%A8%E6%89%8B/215)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-villainesss-maker-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainesss-maker-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Pencipta-Penjahat-Wanita/27)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69189)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C/189)","en":"Yoon Haneul has always been a pushover, someone who would never say no. Then one day, she opens her eyes and realizes that she has become Aila Mertensia, the antagonist of a novel she had written ten years ago. Haneul is content to live the life of a rich couch potato and binge-read novels. But to her dismay, she soon finds herself stuck in a time loop where her day repeats endlessly, and the only way to escape the loop is to act like Aila Mertensia! Haneul doesn’t know the first thing about acting like a villainess. Luckily for her, a mysterious warlock by the name of Killian offers to help her become a true villainess. Her only option is to make a deal with him, but can Haneul really trust this devilishly handsome man?\n\n---\nI have transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel I wrote 10 years ago. On top of that, I reincarnated into the villainess, Ayla, who attempted to curse the female lead and got herself killed by the male lead for it. Then, it should be fine as long as I don't become a villainess, right?\n\n\"I'll live this life playing around like a jobless millionaire!\"\n\nHowever, before long, the days began repeating itself because I wasn't acting like the original villainess, Ayla.\n\n\"Please stop this loop….\"\n\"The solution is simple. Become a true villainess.\"\n\"A true villainess?\"\n\"Wealth, power, glory, men- you can have everything. If you wanted, I would gladly steal the crown for you and place it on your head.\"\n\nThe seemingly dangerous, mysterious and demon-like man, whispered those sweet, tempting words in my ears with a gentle voice.\n\n\"So, what's your answer?\"\n\nCan Ayla really become a true villainess in order to stop the time loop? Haneul a bien l'intention de profiter d'une douce vie de fainéante fortunée et de passer ses journées à lire des romans, mais, à son grand désespoir, elle se retrouve coincée dans une boucle temporelle et revit la même journée encore et encore. La seule solution pour se tirer de cette situation: se comporter comme la méchante Aila! очутилась в теле злодейки романа. Но что если я не стану злодейкой, что тогда?\n-В этот раз я буду бездельничать как безработная богачка всю свою жизнь!\nОднако, стоило мне начать болтаться без дела, как внезапно один и тот же день начал повторяться снова и снова. Возможно ли, что причиной этому стало то, что я решила не вести себя, как злодейка?! Я не хочу умирать!\n-Пожалуйста, остановите временную петлю…\n-Это легко сделать. Тебе лишь нужно стать настоящей злодейкой.\n-Настоящей злодейкой?\n-Богатство, власть, почёт, мужчины… Ты можешь присвоить себе всё что угодно.\nОднажды ко мне пришёл колдун, от которого так и веяло опасностью.\n-Если желаешь, я заберу у неё корону и с радостью возложу на твою голову. И после проложу для тебя дорогу к трону…\nЭтот мужчина, словно Дьявол, нашёптывал мне сладкие слова на ушко своим нежнейшим голосом.\n-Итак, твой ответ?\nСможет ли Айла действительно стать настоящей злодейкой, чтобы остановить временную петлю? Начало соблазнительных уроков дьявола, чтобы стать настоящей «злодейкой», «Создателем злодеев».\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80-%EB%A9%94%EC%9D%B4%EC%BB%A4/2456), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56291021)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-villainesss-maker)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29741)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%8E%A8%E6%89%8B/215)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-villainesss-maker-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainesss-maker-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Pencipta-Penjahat-Wanita/27)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69189)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C/189)","tr":"10 yıl önce yazılmış bir romantik fantezi romanına ışınlandım. Üstelik kadın başrolü lanetleyen ve erkek başrol tarafından öldürülen cani Ayla oldum.  \n  \nÖyleyse cani olmazsam her şey düzelir mi? “Bu hayatı işsiz bir milyoner gibi kıçımı kaşıyarak yaşayacağım!”\n\nAncak… Çok geçmeden günler tekrar etmeye başladı çünkü orijinal kötü karakter Ayla gibi davranmadım.\n  \n“Lütfen Ruph’ı durdurun….”\n\n“Çözümü basit. Gerçek bir cani gibi davran.”\n\n“Gerçek bir cani mi?”\n\n“Zenginlik, güç, ihtişam ve erkekler, her şeye sahip olabilirsin. İstersen tacı bile çalıp kendi kafana yerleştirebilirsin.” Görünüşte tehlikeli ve gizemli adam kulaklarıma tatlı, iblis benzeri sözler söyledi. “Öyleyse cevabın?”\n\nAyla, Ruph’ı durdurmak için gerçekten kötü bir kadın olabilecek mi? İşte gerçek bir ‘cani’ yaratmak için şeytanın büyüleyici sınıfı olan cani yaratıcısı!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** Sair do jogo não era uma opção, tudo o que me restava era uma pilha de dívidas e a protagonista que eu tinha que criar. Para sair desse jogo, preciso criar bem minha sobrinha e ver o final. Então, um estranho misterioso aparece e me entrega uma proposta de casamento suspeita…\n\n“Eu realmente nunca pensei em casamento antes. Um homem que pede em casamento uma mulher que nunca viu antes, sem sequer olhar para ela. Embora eu não conseguisse entender suas intenções ou motivos, ele poderia ser uma pista para um final oculto.\n\n“Está bem. Podemos ser um casal que pode se divorciar a qualquer momento mediante um acordo.” Foi um casamento por contrato em que prometemos o divórcio ao mesmo tempo em que fizemos a proposta. Onizuka có thể là một tay cứng cựa trên đường phố, nhưng khi được giao vào một lớp đủ mọi thành phần du côn, chơi đểu, và hâm hấp, anh sẽ phải tự chứng tỏ bản thân mình trước lũ học trò nghịch còn hơn quỷ."},"links":{"al":"30336","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074C8MD6D","ap":"gto","bw":"series/4277/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/148062/","engtl":"https://kodansha.us/series/gto-great-teacher-onizuka/","kt":"766","mal":"336","mu":"185","raw":"https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?code=1000000010"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

Hesperides, a relatively new breed of vampires, have adapted over hundreds of years in order to be able to go outside during dusk when the sunlight is at its weakest and feast on humans.  \n  \nAburaya Shiro, a high school kid, lives in a town where there has not been a vampire attack in years, but adults keep warning them of going outside at dusk. Shiro and his classmates take this warning lightly and head out at dusk only to find out one of their classmates who they thought they knew well turns out to be a Hesperides. 02e84544-3120-42aa-a591-6057fa87e9d1:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"02e84544-3120-42aa-a591-6057fa87e9d1","title":{"en":"Koudelka"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"クーデルカ"},{"zh":"绝命追杀令"},{"uk":"Куделька"}],"lastChapter":"15","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","fr","uk","pl"],"description":{"en":"This manga is something of a side story to the Playstation game of the same name, though you don't have to have played the game to understand it. Із притулку для пацієнтів з емоційними порушеннями тікає молода дівчина. І судячи із реакції її лікаря – далеко не проста пацієнтка. Здається, її прагнуть не стільки вилікувати, скільки використати, і тому відчайдушно намагаються наздогнати і повернути за будь-яку ціну. Для чого і чому? Відповіді на ці питання вона отримає не скоро, адже після падіння під час своєї втечі втрачає пам’ять і тепер вже зовсім не розуміє, що відбувається. Єдине, що вона пам’ятає, це своє ім’я – Куделька."},"links":{"al":"31219","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/クーデルカ-1-角川コミックス・エース-岩原-裕二/dp/4047133043","ap":"koudelka","kt":"2688","mal":"1219","mu":"588"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

030e940a-d90d-4ef5-8b9b-f46c1da92cbe:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"030e940a-d90d-4ef5-8b9b-f46c1da92cbe","title":{"en":"Tomboy Banzai"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Otenba Banzai"},{"ja":"おてんばバンザイ"}],"lastChapter":"13","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"A shojo one-shot compilation that chiefly features one-shots from the 1960's and ones published in Kodansha shojo magazines, with a theme of celebrating girlhood and girls from all walks of life.\n\n- **Tomboy Banzai** (おてんばバンザイ, Otenba Banzai): A gag one-shot in three parts about a thrill-seeking tomboy and her encounters with a group of petty yakuza.\n- **Clattery Classroom**\n- **The Silver Eyes**: Horror manga is all the rage at Sumi's school. One day, her teacher asks her to check up on her friend, who has been absent from school for some time. Before she knows it, Sumi ends up in a horror manga of her own!\n- **Will You Listen to Swan Lake With Me?**: Ishinomori's whimsical take on Swan Lake.\n- **Manga School**\n- **Little Red Riding Hood**\n- **New Masterpiece Fairytale Little Red Riding Hood**\n- **The Modern Girl's Mentality**: A whimsical commentary on all the hottest trends and pastimes of modern girls.\n- **Summer Break! Operation Cupid**: A boy gets asked by his friend to set him up with a girl, whose friend asks her to set her up with the boy. What does Cupid have in store for these youth?\n- **MY Friend**:\n- **First Love, Ah, First Love, First Love!**: The woes of a girl experiencing her first love.\n- **Miss Resist**: The story of a girl in a literal rebellious phase, acting contrary to what's said to her.\n- **Lala-chan**: A three-chapter gag manga about a girl and her trials and tribulations in love.\n\n*Note: CDJapan link only for MY Friend, which is bundled with other Ishinomori shojo oneshots from different one-shot compilations.*"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/石ノ森章太郎-ebook/dp/B00O0UHRB6/ref=monarch_sidesheet","bw":"de51586d32-c048-497a-ae4c-ef1935f3ea15","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2573111","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/259019/","mu":"gz9bnef"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}
